paper_abstract: By using Banach fixed point theorem, some criteria are established for the existence of nonzero almost periodic solution for Cohen-Grossberg neural networks with continuously distributed delays and impulses. The results in this paper are completely new and complement and improve some of the previously known results. An example is employed to illustrate our feasible results. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: The existence of nonzero almost periodic solution for Cohen-Grossberg neural networks with continuously distributed delays and impulses
